name: SAP NetWeaver Application Server信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2024-23325）
product: ["SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.53", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.77", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.54", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.85", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.89", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.93", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server 7.94", "SAP NetWeaver Application Server KRNL64UC 7.53", "SAP Netweaver Application Server ABAP 7.53", "SAP Netweaver Application Server ABAP 7.77", "SAP Netweaver Application Server ABAP KRNL64UC 7.53", "SAP Netweaver Application Server ABAP 7.85", "SAP Netweaver Application Server ABAP 7.54", "SAP Netweaver Application Server ABAP 7.89", "SAP Netweaver Application Server ABAP 7.93", "SAP Netweaver Application Server ABAP 7.94"]
description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server是德国思爱普（SAP）公司的一款应用程序服务器。SAP NetWeaver Application Server(ABAP)存在信息泄露漏洞，该漏洞源于允许攻击者访问可能受到低权限限制的信息。目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，详情请关注厂商主页：
https://me.sap.com/notes/3360827
patch: SAP NetWeaver Application Server信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2024-23325）的补丁
